body.p: Danville, Kentucky, banker. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah B. Mitchell. Father of Lucy Mitchell, Minnie Mitchell, and Sallie H. Mitchell. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860. Bank cashier in Danville in 1860. Partner with Thomas Barbee in the banking firm of Mitchell & Barbee in 1865. Notary public in Danville in 1865.
